ygData.subject: Checkpoint recover problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I used to make a checkpoint for backing up the crawling in case of any crash. When I tried to launch Heritrix from the latest check point, this error arises:

I used to make a checkpoint for backing up the crawling in case of any 
crash. When I tried to launch Heritrix from the latest check point, this 
error arises:

2011-01-26T13:01:22.449Z SEVERE IllegalStateException: 
com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException: (JE 4.0.71) Environment 
must be closed, caused by: com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException: 
Environment invalid because of previous exception: (JE 4.0.71) 
/usr/local/heritrix-3.1.1-SNAPSHOT/./jobs/arab-league/state 
java.io.FileNotFoundException: 
/usr/local/heritrix-3.1.1-SNAPSHOT/./jobs/arab-league/state/000026b4.jdb 
(No such file or directory) LOG_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Log file missing, log is 
likely invalid. Environment is invalid and must be closed. (in thread 
'arab-league launchthread')

2011-01-26T13:01:21.989Z SEVERE needed log files missing: [00002673.jdb, 
0000266d.jdb, 0000257a.jdb, 000026a8.jdb, 00002684.jdb, 0000254d.jdb, 
00002651.jdb, 00002683.jdb, 00002627.jdb, 00002574.jdb, 0000259c.jdb, 
00002647.jdb, 00000d9a.jdb, 0000263c.jdb, 00002553.jdb, 000025f7.jdb, 
0000260b.jdb, 000001cb.jdb, 000025ba.jdb] (in thread 'arab-league 
launchthread')


I use a crontab to delete .del files only, does that make a porblem in 
the recovery?


-- 
Mahmoud A. Mubarak
Bibliotheca Alexandrina
